info.name: Unearthed Arcana: Spells and Magic Tattoos

element.name: Unearthed Arcana: Spells and Magic Tattoos

description.p: Conjure forth new magic in your D&D games with the spells and tattoos introduced in todayâ€™s Unearthed Arcana. Many of the spells focus on summoning, and the tattoos allow you to ink magic onto your very skin.
